Aktivit\u00e4ten und somit f\u00fcr das Wachstum Deiner Region\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du akquirierst selbstst\u00e4ndig \u00c4rzt:innen und dies als Konzeptberater:in, um entreprise \u00e0 mission \u0153uvrant pour un monde en meilleure sant\u00e9 avec plus de 2500 employ\u00e9s en France, en Allemagne et en Italie. Depuis 2013, Doctolib am\u00e9liore le quotidien de plus de 300 000 professionnels de sant\u00e9 gr\u00e2ce \u00e0 des technologies et des services innovants. Doctolib rend \u00e9galement l\u2019acc\u00e8s aux soins plus rapide et plus \u00e9galitaire : plus de 60 millions d\u2019Europ\u00e9ens prennent rendez-vous et g\u00e8rent leur sant\u00e9 via Doctolib, en toute s\u00e9curit\u00e9.Parce que nous concevons des services accessibles \u00e0 tous, nous cherchons \u00e0 constituer une \u00e9quipe diversifi\u00e9e: n\u2019h\u00e9site pas \u00e0 postuler et \u00e0 partager avec nous ton projet professionnel !\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Vos soient respect\u00e9s et les r\u00e9serves lev\u00e9es dans le cas \u00e9ch\u00e9ant (p\u00e9rim\u00e8tre France)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\u00catre Force de proposition sur partenaires et mise en place de contrats cadres.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Participer aux diff\u00e9rentes r\u00e9unions techniques avec les propri\u00e9taires et ses repr\u00e9sentants ainsi que celles li\u00e9es \u00e0 la gestion courante des immeubles avec le Building manager\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Participer \u00e0 la construction du budget chaque ann\u00e9e ainsi qu\u2019aux exercices de reforecast.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;D\u00e9clarer les sinistres et participer aux r\u00e9unions d\u2019expertise\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Renseigner \/ compl\u00e9ter les registres de s\u00e9curit\u00e9 en fonction des diff\u00e9rents sites lou\u00e9s par Doctolib\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Les qualit\u00e9s attendues pour ce poste\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Avant de poursuivre votre lecture, si vous n\\u0026#39;avez pas le profil exact d\u00e9crit ci-dessous, mais que vous pensez que cette description de poste correspond \u00e0 vos comp\u00e9tences et \u00e0 vos besoins, nous vous encourageons tout de m\u00eame \u00e0 posturler KPI\u2026)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Tu es dynamique, r\u00e9actif(ve), tr\u00e8s polyvalent(e) et toujours de bonne humeur avec le sens des priorit\u00e9s\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Tu as envie de changer le quotidien de ceux qui travaillent \u00e0 tes c\u00f4t\u00e9s\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Tu Nous n\\u0026#39;acceptons pas seulement la diversit\u00e9 chez Doctolib, nous la respectons et la c\u00e9l\u00e9brons !\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;span style=\\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt;Plus les id\u00e9es seront diverses, plus notre produit am\u00e9liorera r\u00e9ellement les soins de sant\u00e9 pour tous. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 co-construit avec des kin\u00e9sith\u00e9rapeutes pour pouvoir remplir leurs besoins. Ce nouveau produit, associ\u00e9 \u00e0 notre agenda historique permet ainsi de proposer \u00e0 nos kin\u00e9sith\u00e9rapeutes une offre adapt\u00e9e et compl\u00e8te.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Vos missions\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;En tant que Consultant Doctolib Kin\u00e9, vous prendrez la suite du commercial. pensez que cette description de poste correspond \u00e0 vos comp\u00e9tences et \u00e0 vos besoins, nous vous encourageons tout de m\u00eame \u00e0 postuler poss\u00e9dez un dipl\u00f4me en vente ou \u00e9quivalent (IUT\/ BTS\/ licence commerciale), ou un dipl\u00f4me d\u2019\u00e9cole de commerce\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Vous avez soins de sant\u00e9 pour tous - ind\u00e9pendamment de vos origines, de votre apparence. Cet \u00e9tat d\\u0026#39;esprit se traduit aussi dans notre processus de recrutement : Doctolib est un employeur qui respecte l\\u0026#39;\u00e9galit\u00e9 des chances. Nous n\\u0026#39;acceptons pas seulement la diversit\u00e9 chez Doctolib, nous la respectons et la c\u00e9l\u00e9brons !\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;Plus les id\u00e9es seront diverses, plus notre produit am\u00e9liorera r\u00e9ellement les soins de sant\u00e9 pour tous. Patients Insights\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Advanced Data Analysis: Utilize advanced analytics to delve deep into customer data, extracting actionable insights to drive strategic marketing decisions.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Segmentation Mastery: Develop sophisticated segmentation strategies using CRM tools to deliver highly personalized marketing messages.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Insight Distribution: Systematically distribute insights and data-driven recommendations to local teams, ensuring alignment and optimization of local strategies with central initiatives.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt; Patient Journeys\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Journey Mapping and Tooling: Use CRM systems to design, implement, and optimize customer journey maps, focusing on automation and scalability across different regions.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Personalization at Scale: Implement personalization strategies through CRM tooling that automates adaptations based on customer interactions and preferences.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Performance Analysis: Monitor and report on the effectiveness of journey strategies, using CRM tools to adjust tactics in real-time based on performance analytics.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt; Transactional Communication\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Centralized Management: Oversee the strategy and execution of all transactional communications from a central perspective, utilizing CRM systems to ensure consistency and compliance across all regions.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Optimized Implementation: Enhance the timing, language, and segmentation of transactional communications using CRM tools to increase efficiency and effectiveness.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Continuous Improvement: Regularly refine communication strategies based on detailed analytics and feedback from local teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt; Opt-in Collection and Profiling\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Strategic Opt-in Management: Develop and implement strategies to increase opt-in rates using CRM tools that allow for innovative and compliant methods of engagement.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Advanced Profiling Techniques: Utilize CRM software to conduct detailed profiling, ensuring accurate data collection for enhanced targeting and segmentation.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Compliance Assurance: Maintain a comprehensive understanding of GDPR and other data protection regulations, ensuring all CRM practices meet legal standards.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt; Cross-Channel Optimization\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ol\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Tooling Management: Oversee the integration and optimization of CRM tools to ensure seamless coordination across marketing channels, emphasizing app enhancements to improve overall user engagement.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Best Practices Framework: Develop and standardize best practices for cross-channel campaigns, particularly those aimed at boosting app engagement. Equip local teams with these guidelines to ensure consistency and effectiveness across all platforms.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Analytics Support: Provide CRM tools and analytics methodologies to local teams, enabling precise measurement and continuous optimization of app-centric marketing efforts.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h1\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who You Are:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h1\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Technical CRM Expert\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: You bring a strong technical proficiency in CRM systems, capable of managing complex tooling and facilitating its use by local teams.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Strategic Thinker with Analytical Skills:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; Your ability to analyze data and create actionable strategies is matched by your expertise in using CRM technology to implement these strategies effectively.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Leader in Cross-Functional Collaboration\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: With exceptional communication skills, you can bridge central strategies with local execution, ensuring seamless operation and alignment across the company.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Qualifications:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Bachelor\u2019s or Master\u2019s degree in Marketing, Business, Technology, or related field.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;At least 7 years of experience in CRM management, with specific experience in managing CRM platforms and tooling.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Deep expertise in at least one major CRM platform (e.g., Salesforce, Braze, Microsoft Dynamics).\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Strong understanding of marketing automation, data analysis tools, and related technologies.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Proven ability to manage multi-regional or global projects in a cross-functional environment.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;At Doctolib, we believe in improving access to healthcare for everyone - regardless of where you come from, what you look like. This translates into our recruitment process: Doctolib is an equal opportunity employer. We don\\u0026#39;t just accept diversity at Doctolib, we respect and celebrate it!\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;The more diverse ideas are heard, the more our product will truly improve healthcare for all. Du \u00fcbernimmst eine Schl\u00fcsselrolle und arbeitest eng mit dem Deployment Team und den Sales Teams zusammen. Du ber\u00e4tst und unterst\u00fctzt unsere Gro\u00dfkunden, sorgst f\u00fcr deren strategische Ausrichtung mithilfe von Analysen und bist ma\u00dfgeblich f\u00fcr den Erfolg deiner Accounts verantwortlich.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Deine Aufgaben\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du verantwortest unsere Bestandskund:innen im mittleren Marktsegment \u00fcber den niedergelassenen Bereich hinweg (Mid Market)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Nach der Implementierung \\u0026amp;amp; dem Onboarding bist du zentrale:r Ansprechpartner:in f\u00fcr \u00e4rztliche Leiter:innen und Praxismanager:innen und baust eine optimale Kundenbeziehung und -zufriedenheit auf.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du erkennst Optimierungspotential und arbeitest aktiv mit unserem Produkt, um durch entsprechende Anpassungen optimal auf die Bed\u00fcrfnisse unserer Kund:innen einzugehen und die gemeinsam definierten Ziele zu erreichen\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du identifizierst Upsell-Potentiale und setzt diese eigenst\u00e4ndig oder in Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Sales Teams um\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du f\u00fchrst regelm\u00e4\u00dfige Kundengespr\u00e4che durch und bewertest und analysiert so die Bed\u00fcrfnisse unserer Kunden. We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with engineering, design, and business teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;What you\\u0026#39;ll do\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;We are looking for an Engineering Manager to join our Core Frontend Team and help us become the #1 digital and secure medical companion for patients.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;More specifically, you\\u0026#39;ll join a team of engineers, designers and accessibility specialists working on advanced frontend development topics, with a strong focus on our own design system, \\u0026quot;Oxygen\\u0026quot;. As a frontend \\u0026quot;platform\\u0026quot; team, they support and empower other teams contributing to common frontend libraries, and help spread state-of-the-art workflows and practices. They also regularly craft new components for our designers and developers, leveraging advanced Typescript and Accessibility standards and ensuring high reusability of the design system across our codebases.They are mindful of the overall performance on our websites, and \u201cenable\u201d other teams to create and maintain optimized frontend applications and libraries by defining and implementing strong, future-proof internal standards and quality levels.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your role as Engineering Manager :\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will be both a technical leader and a people manager, coaching and training your team members while building an amazing engineering organization at Doctolib. Working in the tech team at Doctolib involves building innovative products and features to improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with engineering, design, and business teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;What you\\u0026#39;ll do\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib is seeking an Engineering Manager to join our Business Performance domain.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;The Growth stream has two main missions:\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ensure Doctolib\\u0026#39;s growth through great user experience, referral programs, try-out sessions and clear value propositions\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Build tools to run prevention campaigns on our platform (B2C, B2B) and via other channels like email, push notification.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your role as Engineering Manager :\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will be both a technical leader and a people manager, coaching and training your team members while building an amazing engineering organization at Doctolib. In this role, you will:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Be directly in charge of a team of full-stack developers;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Manage and grow the performance and career of your team;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ensure business objectives are met the roadmap for your team, and be the end-to-end owner of the team\u2019s production, quality, and delivery;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Participate in code reviews and be hands-on if required;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Lead cross functional initiatives to up-level our engineering team;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Partner with Talent up);\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You understand the value of testing your code;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have the ability to adapt to the most efficient satisfaction of our clients in France for the cluster.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Your missions will include:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\u25cf Lead strategy plan with our key Clinics Partners (Ramsay, Elsan,etc): increase products\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;penetration, reinforce local presence \\u0026amp;amp; trust, impulse long-term partnership vision\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Design our strategy to increase our Product Market Fit for Specialists doctors\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Launch our new Product offer in October for the Specialists\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Define the strategy for our future AI assistant: interview practitioners, assess product\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;market readiness, co-create Sales \\u0026amp;amp; Marketing plan\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Reinforce our understanding of the Midwives market: design Marketing plan and prepare\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;new product launch strategy\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Work hand-in-hands with the right stakeholders internally to follow and deliver our sales,\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;marketing and satisfaction plans\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\u25cf Review Business Plan targets quarterly for each growth KPI to feed the annual Doctolib\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;Strategic Plan; and monitor its achievement\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your role will also include the management of an intern\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you are\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;If you don\u2019t meet all the requirements below but believe this opportunity matches your expectations and experience, we still encourage you to apply!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You could be our next teammate if you:\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have 4 years of experience in consulting firm, GTM or fast-growth environment;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Are highly results\/action-oriented, super well structured, analytical and fact-based;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Prioritize user experience above all. In March 2023, Siilo strengthened its position and potential, when it was acquired by Doctolib and since then has continued as Doctolib Siilo.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;More than 650,000 healthcare professionals use Doctolib Siilo to discuss and coordinate patient care with colleagues both within and beyond their organisational walls. Today, Doctolib Siilo is the largest medical network in Europe.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib is a purpose-led company that strives for a healthier world with more than 2,800 employees across France, Italy, Germany, and the Netherlands. Doctolib serves more than 80 million Europeans, offering a fast, frictionless, and secure journey for all their care needs.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Siilo and Doctolib\u2019s joint goal is to improve the daily life of care teams through a new generation of technologies.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Your Job:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As an iOS Engineer at Doctolib Siilo, you\u2019ll be working with a multicultural and diverse engineering team further developing our secure messenger app. As a member of our iOS team, you\u2019ll be directly contributing to develop and maintain our industry-leading app, which is trusted and used by thousands of healthcare professionals every day. You\\u0026#39;ll be involved in the technical design of new features and play a key role in implementing these features together with the team. In our codebase, we use a mix of UIKit and SwiftUI, RxSwift, Combine and our app uses end-to-end encryption, and strong cryptography for local storage and data exchange, so you should be comfortable with most of these technologies. Our team strives to always deliver high quality code and every feature we develop is evaluated and tested by our QA team. We are proud to have 99.9% crash-free users! We value certain aspects of Scrum, such as the morning stand-up and retrospective, but at the same time strive to maintain a pragmatic approach, minimising meetings and prioritising developer happiness to the fullest.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;You will be responsible for:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Building new features in Swift for our iOS application, maintaining and improving our current codebase.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You\\u0026#39;ll be using frameworks such as Alamofire, RxSwift and SQLiteCipher.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;The full development life cycle, including communicating with stakeholders (for instance product, design, QA) throughout the development process, as well as debugging production issues.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You\\u0026#39;ll be involved with not only engineering, but also with product-related and design discussions and decisions.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Owning the tech and deploying code every day.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Keeping security and privacy front and center to everything you do.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What we\u2019re looking for from you:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;3+ years of experience with iOS development; fluency in Swift and comfort using UIKit, SwiftUI, RxSwift, and Combine\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You\\u0026#39;re passionate about writing clean, tested, and well-documented code\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are willing to always discuss new ideas and approaches to solve problems. You understand that the technologies surrounding iOS development are always evolving and you are eager to learn, code and share new solutions with your colleagues\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You love to work collaboratively. You understand that the whole is greater than the sum of the parts\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You\\u0026#39;re comfortable with using 3rd-party libraries and dependency managers (we use CocoaPods and SPM)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Fluent in English\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Experience with the following is a plus:\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Reactive programming (we use RxSwift and are moving our project to Combine)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Cryptography\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Secure storage of data (keychain, encrypted database, data protection)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Delivering universal apps\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Contributing to open-source You will manage external providers \/ suppliers to ensure we are here to provide the best IT experience to our colleagues and internal teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;They expect modern, secure and efficient solutions. We are here to guarantee them!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will work on projects that follow a quarterly roadmap, with clear rules to prioritize them based on the business values and capacity of the team.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;After a project, the IT Squad is still responsible to manage these solutions. You will become responsible for a subset of applications (IT Squad scope) to imagine an efficient and automated way to operate them.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;We are present already in four countries (DE, FR, IT and NL), so you work with several teams with different cultures, backgrounds, ways of working and laws. You will manage external providers \/ suppliers to ensure we are here to provide the best IT experience to our colleagues and internal teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;They expect modern, secure and efficient solutions. We are here to guarantee them!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will work on projects that follow a quarterly roadmap, with clear rules to prioritize them based on the business values and capacity of the team.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;After a project, the IT Squad is still responsible to manage these solutions. You will become responsible for a subset of applications (IT Squad scope) to imagine an efficient and automated way to operate them.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;We are present already in four countries (DE, FR, IT and NL), so you work with several teams with different cultures, backgrounds, ways of working and laws. Be ready to manage complex situations and take responsibility.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026amp;nbsp;Your Roles and Responsibilities\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will develop integrations between applications through various mediums (APIs, scripts, iPaaS, ETL etc\u2026)\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will qualify new SaaS solutions that will be added \/ changed in the IT application landscape. You assess the needs and find the best solution based on several criterias like business performance, cost, security and design consistency.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will work in collaboration with the internal customer to build the functional \/ technical requirements of the solution you\u2019ll have to develop, deploy and maintain, you will be requested to write technical and functional documentation for the support department.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will work on automations for onboarding \/ offboarding of users, managing licenses and data. Those activities are key for a scale-up company and you will be responsible for that.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will also be the Level 3 escalation point for support requests or IT crisis management and weekly based on-call shifts\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will mentor the junior engineers and support teams will also be part of your daily life.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Your Profile :\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You must have a cloud administrator certification (Azure, AWS etc\u2026)\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have experience on the Azure cloud (PaaS, IaaS, FaaS)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have scripting experience on python, powershell\/bash, javascript, usual dev practices\/tools like github, ci\/cd, testing, API development (REST \/ SOAP).\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have experience on the security part: IAM\/IGA, SSO, SAML, Oauth2, Open id.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You know protocols such as HTTP, DNS, LDAP, SFTP, IP, ICMP, TLS and architectural styles such as REST and SOAP.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You appreciate being the point of contact for internal customer relations (technical contact, user contact, etc.) and have a real sense of service with these dual technical-functional skills.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are familiar with Agile \/ SCRUM framework and rituals, you are at ease with Atlassian boards and estimation rituals.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are curious, autonomous, flexible, rigorous, enthusiastic, passionate, you have a taste for teamspirit and fun.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are comfortable Zusammenarbeit mit externen Partnern\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Das Doctolib Parent Care Programm, das extra Elternzeit (1 Monat), Eltern-Treffen und inspirierenden Pr\u00e4sentationen enth\u00e4lt\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Moderne B\u00fcros, die einen Austausch und das Wohlbefinden f\u00f6rdern\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ein gef\u00f6rdertes Sportangebot mit unserem Partner Urban Sports Club\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Eine betriebliche Krankenversicherung mit vielen extra Gesundheitsleistungen wie beispielsweise Zusch\u00fcsse zu Sehhilfen, Zahnbehandlungen oder Naturheilkunde\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Verpflegungsbudget und gesunde Snacks im B\u00fcro, sowie regelm\u00e4\u00dfige Angebote zum Fr\u00fchst\u00fcck oder ist ein Arbeitgeber, der Chancengleichheit f\u00f6rdert und Vielfalt sch\u00e4tzt. trotzdem!\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;Um Teil unseres Teams zu werden, bringst Du Folgendes eigenst\u00e4ndig Projekte erfolgreich umgesetzt\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du bist in der Lage mit Deinen ausgepr\u00e4gten Kommunikationsf\u00e4higkeiten zu begeistern und kannst auch anspruchsvollste Stakeholder proaktiv beraten\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du denkst analytisch, handelst strukturiert und bist in der origines, de ton apparence. Cet \u00e9tat d\\u0026#39;esprit se traduit aussi dans notre processus de recrutement : Doctolib est un employeur qui respecte l\\u0026#39;\u00e9galit\u00e9 des chances. Nous n\\u0026#39;acceptons pas seulement la diversit\u00e9 chez Doctolib, nous la respectons et la c\u00e9l\u00e9brons !\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;span style=\\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt;Plus les id\u00e9es seront diverses, plus notre produit am\u00e9liorera r\u00e9ellement les soins de sant\u00e9 pour tous. Tu es invit\u00e9 \u00e0 postuler chez Doctolib ou \u00e0 recommander quelqu\\u0026#39;un que tu connais, quel que soit leur sexe, leur religion, leur \u00e2ge, leur orientation sexuelle, leur origine ethnique, leur handicap ou leur lieu d\\u0026#39;origine. Si tu as un handicap, fais-nous savoir si nous pouvons faciliter le processus d\\u0026#39;entretien pour toi!\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;span style=\\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt;L\u2019ensemble des informations transmises via ce formulaire est trait\u00e9 par Doctolib \u00e0 des fins de gestion des candidatures. Pour plus d\u2019informations concernant la fa\u00e7on dont Doctolib traite les donn\u00e9es li\u00e9es \u00e0 ta candidature, clique \\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;a href=\\u0026quot;https:\/\/media.doctolib.com\/image\/upload\/mkg\/file\/privacy_notice_recrutement_fr_1.pdf\\u0026quot; More than 500,000 healthcare professionals use Siilo to discuss and coordinate patient care with colleagues both within and beyond their organisational walls. Today, Siilo is the largest medical network in Europe.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Since March 2023, Siilo has strengthened its position and potential, when it was acquired by Doctolib and since then has continued as Doctolib Siilo. Doctolib is a purpose-led company that strives for a healthier world with more than 2,500 employees across France, Italy, and Germany. Doctolib serves more than 300,000 healthcare professionals and more than 70 million Europeans, offering a fast, frictionless, and secure journey for all their care needs. Siilo and Doctolib\u2019s joint goal is to improve the daily life of care teams through a new generation of technologies. We believe that care teams are the center of our healthcare systems and supporting them is the best way to look after patient health. Siilo\u2019s office in Amsterdam has become Doctolib\u2019s Dutch office, from where the Dutch, Belgium, United Kingdom and Irish markets for Care Coordination are serviced.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Within Siilo we offer a business-to-business paid solution for hospitals, care organisations, and associations, called \u2018Siilo for Organisations\u2019. This secure and compliant messenger solution operates in a closed network and allows for better communication, collaboration, education and engagement within healthcare organisations.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As a Key Account Sales Lead for the Siilo for Organisations team, you will operate from Doctolib\u2019s Dutch office in Amsterdam and will report directly to the Head of Siilo for Organisations. You will sell and promote Siilo for Organisations in one or more of the focus countries (NL, BE, UK, IR).\\u0026amp;nbsp; In this role, you will become thoroughly acquainted with Siilo\\u0026#39;s products and services, gaining in-depth knowledge about the market(s) and organisations. Selling and implementing Siilo for Organisations requires the ability to work on multiple prospects in parallel and align different stakeholders to effectively work towards closing deals as well as driving user growth.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Full sales cycle - from the first contact with the healthcare professionals to the signing of the contract with IT\/management\/DPOs of the organisation.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Creating strong links with all stakeholders involved for Siilo for Organisations; Data Protection Officers (DPOs), IT \\u0026amp;amp; Communication managers, and healthcare professionals, by understanding their needs and supporting them.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Understanding and supporting implementation strategies, providing guidance to the organisations and trainings to their users.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Conducting inbound and outbound sales cycle (from midsize (30-500) to large (\\u0026amp;gt;500) organisations (ranging from hospitals, associations, regional and care organisations).\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Staying updated with local industry trends, market competition, and emerging technologies within the healthcare sector and sharing insights with internal stakeholders.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Collaborating closely with the legal, marketing, user and product teams to align product development and sales strategy efforts, share insights, and drive overall company growth.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Developing a strong presence with local teams, advocating for local teams\\u0026#39; needs and requirements to ensure you have the necessary support to fulfil your responsibilities effectively.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Facilitating the exchange of best practices and successful strategies among the local teams to encourage continuous improvement and innovation.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you are\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;2+ years of experience in sales\/partnership management and are experienced in communicating with key accounts at C-level.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;2+ years of professional work experience in either the UK, NL or Belgium (Flemish and Wallonian) is strongly preferred.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Excellent communication skills in both English and Dutch.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;A Bachelor\u2019s degree education or higher.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Knowledge of and passion for healthcare.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have excellent hunting \\u0026amp;amp; pitching skills.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You feel comfortable in a fast-paced environment and enjoy learning something new every day.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have excellent communication skills, both written and spoken.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Affinity with tech, systems and tooling is preferred.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are able to independently manage multiple sales cycles and to follow-up on a large number of opportunities and engage with different types of stakeholders within a prospect organisation.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Experience with Customer Relationship Manager (CRM) systems such as Salesforce and producing sales decks is preferred.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;The interview process\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;45\u2019 ITW with the Talent Partner\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;1\u201915 ITW with the Hiring Manager including a Case study\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Final ITW\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Job details\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Initial term of 12 months\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Full Time\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Workplace: Amsterdam\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Start date: ASAP\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Remuneration: Fix + bonus on objectives (according to your profile)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;A stock options plan for every Doctoliber\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Our team members are rewarded well, not only from a salary perspective but also with\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Learning \\u0026amp;amp; development opportunities\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Home office equipment allowance\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Team spirit \\u0026amp;amp; creativity budget\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;27 days of annual leave per year (and the ability to accrue more days on your work anniversary!)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Flexibility days allowing to work in EU countries and the UK 10 days per year\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Employee share plan\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Solidarity Days (2 days per year to help health charities and create a positive social impact)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Wellbeing program (free mental health and coaching offer with our partner moka.care)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;A flexible workplace policy offering a hybrid work mode\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Reimbursement of public transportation if you live outside the Amsterdam highway ring\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Relocation support for international mobilities\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;At Doctolib, we believe in improving access to healthcare for everyone - regardless of where you come from, what you look like. This translates into our recruitment process: Doctolib is an equal opportunity employer. Als Praktikant:in wirst du alle Aspekte des Recruitings f\u00fcr verschiedene Teams kennenlernen und t\u00e4glich mit verschiedenen Kandidaten, Recruitern und Interviewerpartnern zusammenarbeiten.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Deine Aufgaben\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Als Praktikant:in unterst\u00fctzt Du uns dabei in folgenden Aufgabenbereichen:\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Candidate Experience:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; Du bist verantwortlich f\u00fcr verschiedene Kommunikationswege (E-Mails, Nachrichten, Kalendereinladungen...) und stellst sicher, dass die Kandidaten alle n\u00f6tigen Informationen \u00fcber ihre anstehenden Interviews haben. Du bist eine wichtige Ansprechperson f\u00fcr Kandidaten und arbeitest eng mit unseren Recruitern zusammen, um eine reibungslose Candidate Experience zu schaffen.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Interviewplanung:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; Du planst verschiedene Interviews, von Videointerviews bis hin zu Case Studies in unseren B\u00fcros. style=\\u0026quot;font-size: 10pt;\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt;La pr\u00e9vention est l\\u0026#39;un des principaux leviers pour am\u00e9liorer le syst\u00e8me de soins, et en ad\u00e9quation avec les missions de Doctolib pour \u0153uvrer pour un monde en meilleure sant\u00e9.\\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;Il existe trois formes de pr\u00e9vention\u2009: primaire (de l\u2019exercice physique \u00e0 la nutrition, la lutte contre les addictions ou encore la vaccination), secondaire (limiter l\u2019impact de la maladie sur la sant\u00e9 \u00e0 travers les d\u00e9pistages), et tertiaire (l\u2019ensemble des moyens mis en \u0153uvre pour \u00e9viter la survenue de complications et de rechutes pour les personnes atteintes de maladies chroniques). La France est en retard par rapport \u00e0 d\u2019autres pays europ\u00e9ens, en particulier sur la pr\u00e9vention primaire et secondaire.\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Notre vision est d\u2019accompagner l\u2019effort national de virage vers une m\u00e9decine plus pr\u00e9ventive:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Pour les patients : nous voulons favoriser une attitude plus pr\u00e9ventive, en commen\u00e7ant par leur offrir une information de qualit\u00e9 et la capacit\u00e9 d\u2019agir simplement. \\u0026lt;br\\u0026gt;En effet, 90% des fran\u00e7ais pensent que la pr\u00e9vention est prioritaire mais seulement 10% pensent \u00eatre bien inform\u00e9s. L\u2019enjeu num\u00e9ro 1 est donc l\u2019information!\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Pour les professionnels de sant\u00e9 : nous voulons proposer des \u00e9volutions dans nos logiciels pour leur permettre de faire de la pr\u00e9vention pendant et au-del\u00e0 de la consultation\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib Pr\u00e9vention est une nouvelle activit\u00e9 pour Doctolib qui a commenc\u00e9 par un mod\u00e8le \u00e9conomique M\u00e9dia : nous relayons les campagnes d\\u0026#39;institutions publiques comme Sant\u00e9 Publique France (Mois sans tabac) ou l\u2019INCa (vaccination HPV), et d\u2019associations comme la Ligue contre le Cancer, avec des r\u00e9sultats tr\u00e8s encourageants. de communication\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;2\/ Conna\u00eetre parfaitement les enjeux des grandes causes de pr\u00e9vention de vos code\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You will improve the experience and satisfaction of our users by ensuring that we have the necessary test coverage to stop bugs Cet \u00e9tat d\\u0026#39;esprit se traduit aussi dans notre processus de recrutement : Doctolib est un employeur qui respecte l\\u0026#39;\u00e9galit\u00e9 des chances. Nous n\\u0026#39;acceptons pas seulement la diversit\u00e9 chez Doctolib, nous la respectons et la c\u00e9l\u00e9brons !\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;span style=\\u0026quot;font-weight: 400;\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt;Plus les id\u00e9es seront diverses, plus notre produit am\u00e9liorera r\u00e9ellement les soins de sant\u00e9 pour tous. Tu es invit\u00e9 \u00e0 postuler chez Doctolib ou \u00e0 recommander quelqu\\u0026#39;un que tu connais, quel que soit leur sexe, leur religion, leur \u00e2ge, leur orientation sexuelle, leur origine ethnique, leur handicap ou leur lieu d\\u0026#39;origine. gemeinsam die Gesundheitsbranche zu transformieren und zu digitalisieren? Du willst ma\u00dfgeblich Treiber:in unseres deutschlandweiten Wachstums sein mit einem Produkt was einen Mehrwert f\u00fcr die Gesellschaft bietet und einen deutlichen Einfluss hat? Dann nimm unsere Herausforderung an, werde Teil unserer Erfolgsgeschichte und das gemeinsam mit ca. 3.000 motivierten Kolleg:innen in Frankreich, Deutschland und Italien und bewirb Dich jetzt!\\u0026lt;\/span\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Deine sch\u00e4tzt. In March 2023, Siilo strengthened its position and potential, when it was acquired by Doctolib and since then has continued as Doctolib Siilo.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;More than 600,000 healthcare professionals use Doctolib Siilo to discuss and coordinate patient care with colleagues both within and beyond their organisational walls. Today, Doctolib Siilo is the largest medical network in Europe.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib is a purpose-led company that strives for a healthier world with more than 2,800 employees across France, Italy, Germany, and the Netherlands. Doctolib serves more than 80 million Europeans, offering a fast, frictionless, and secure journey for all their care needs.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Siilo and Doctolib\u2019s joint goal is to improve the daily life of care teams through a new generation of technologies.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Your job:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;In the Senior Backend Engineer role at Doctolib Siilo, you\u2019ll work alongside a team that is passionate about building and delivering great products and great customer experience.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You\u2019ll be responsible for everything on the server-side of our products; from supporting our client developers with design and development of APIs, until monitoring that our applications and databases are secure and running smoothly in the AWS cloud. Alongside that, you\u2019ll play an active role within our technical team, helping us shape our product vision and strategy.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;This is a truly exciting role for an intelligent, self-motivated problem solver who has a track record of building industry changing software within early stage start-ups or scaling tech businesses. The opportunity that you have to drive our business forward in leaps and bounds is unparalleled!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;You will be responsible for:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Building, owning and maintaining Doctolib Siilo\u2019s backend providing API\u2019s for our mobile and web clients using Java 17, Spring Boot, Akka and more. Additionally contribute to our web based internal admin-tool (Angular).\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Managing and monitoring our cloud infrastructure at AWS that we are migrating to use \u201cinfrastructure-as-code\u201d (Terraform) more and more\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ensuring our user\u2019s data is safe and secure by keeping security and privacy front and center to everything you do.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Collaborating with your peers working on Android, iOS, web and Doctolib\u2019s Rails backend building an awesome experience for our 650,000+ users and contributing directly to growing Doctolib Siilo\\u0026#39;s network of healthcare professionals.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;The full development life cycle, including communicating with stakeholders (for instance product, design, QA) throughout the development process, as well as debugging production issues.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What we\u2019re looking for from you:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;8+ years experience with API design and development using Java 8+ (we\u2019re currently on Java 17)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Experience running software on cloud infrastructure, ideally AWS\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ideally experience with frameworks and libraries like Spring Boot, Akka and Protobuf\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Experience working with database technologies, preferably JPA, MySQL, MongoDb and Elasticsearch\/Opensearch\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You enjoy figuring out why things work, not just that they work\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You\u2019re fluent in English\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Our \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;team members are In March 2023, Doctolib Siilo strengthened its position and potential, when it was acquired by Doctolib.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;More than 650,000 healthcare professionals use Doctolib Siilo to discuss and coordinate patient care with colleagues both within and beyond their organisational walls. Today, Doctolib Siilo is the largest medical network in Europe.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Since 2013, Doctolib has been striving for a healthier world by providing new-generation technology. With more than 2,800 employees across France, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands, Doctolib improves the daily lives of healthcare professionals and serves more than 80 million Europeans, offering a fast, frictionless, and secure journey for all their care needs.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What we do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib\\u0026#39;s engineering environment is very rich: we are building innovative products and features aiming each day to ease doctors\\u0026#39; and patients\\u0026#39; lives.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Join a team of hard working entrepreneurs, consisting of over 60 feature teams, who are passionate about transforming healthcare. You will play an active role in shaping a fast-growing company from day one!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;To go beyond the ad please check\\u0026lt;a href=\\u0026quot;https:\/\/medium.com\/doctolib\\u0026quot;\\u0026gt; our technical blog\\u0026lt;\/a\\u0026gt;. The team currently consists of 15+ engineers with continued plans to grow this year.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will foster a collaborative and innovative team culture that encourages learning and growth. You will collaborate on a daily basis with internal and external stakeholders, including our engineering teams based in multiple countries (France, Germany, Italy and the Netherlands).\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Key attributes we are looking for\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Management:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; You have proven experience of building multiple engineering teams and mentoring managers and senior individual contributors working on multiple different stacks.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Hiring: \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;You know how to define and put a sourcing strategy to grow our engineering team in Amsterdam in alignment with our Doctolib culture.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Technical leader: \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;You have a strong technical background in software engineering, architecture, distributed systems, and project management. Preferably in architectures using native mobile clients and self-managed server applications.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;User centricity: \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;You empathize with users, understand their needs, and champion their voice throughout the development process. world.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib is used today by 70 million patients and 340,000 healthcare professionals in 3 countries (France, Germany, and Italy).We aim to improve the daily lives of care teams by providing them with a new generation of technologies and services. We believe that care teams are the center of our healthcare systems and supporting them is the best way to improve patient health.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;We also aim to improve health for all, by offering a fast and frictionless journey for all care episodes, creating new ways for people to receive care, and empowering them to become actors of their health.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Our Design team comprises individuals with diverse skill sets, including User Research, Brand Design, UX Writing, Design operations, and Product Design. We all strive to deliver \\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;exceptional user experiences to patients and healthcare professionals\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As a Product Designer, you will be asked to transform complex healthcare problems into a blueprint of simple, memorable, consistent, and accessible experiences that align precisely between business needs and user needs.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Owning the entire design process from exploring the problem definition to developing a suitable solution.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Creating impactful designs using user interviews, analyzing data, formulating and validating hypotheses, sketching, and prototyping.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Translating qualitative and quantitative insights into hypotheses, prototypes, tests\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Understanding how to work from business goals to identify and seize new opportunities.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Work hand-in-hand with engineers and the project manager to develop new functionalities\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Looking for ways to expand your skills and to grow in your field. You like to share your knowledge and contribute to the growth of the team.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with engineering, design, and business teams.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;We are looking for a\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt; Senior Product Manager\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; to join the \\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Data Collection\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; team in the \\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Health Care Professionals Data Platform\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; domain.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As a\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Senior Product Manager\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;, your mission will be to collect, enrich and maintain the most qualitative data for all Health Care Professionals (HCPs) operating in our markets (France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Belgium, UK) and distribute it to both internal teams (Sales, Marketing...) and end users. You will be working in the feature team owning the Master Data Management tool.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As a Senior Product Manager, your responsibilities will include but are not limited to:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ensure all Health Care Professionals (HCPs) where we operate are included in our internal Directory\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Improve the overall quality of information we collect on HCPs by adding new external data sources to our HCPs Directory and improving the matching rate between those sources\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Implement a Data Mesh Architecture for Health Care Professionals at Doctolib including an exhaustive and accessible\\u0026amp;nbsp; HCPs Data Catalog\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Define the vision and own the product strategy on HCP Directory and HCP Data Catalog\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Work closely with the Engineering Manager to build a prioritized roadmap and product plan to deliver this vision in a scalable way\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Be able to explain and convince the different stakeholders about your choices\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Lead the execution of the projects autonomously, from problem definition to solution framing, specs writing, validation of developments, rollout and follow-up results and impacts\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Define each project specifications and ensure key product management processes for the confidentiality and security of health data\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Work closely with our end users and cross-functionally with development teams, user researchers, designers, and data analysts in an agile environment.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Contribute to the global growth of the product team by engaging in knowledge sharing, best-practice implementation, and creating new processes to help us adapt as we scale\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you In March 2023, Doctolib Siilo strengthened its position and potential, when it was acquired by Doctolib.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;More than 650,000 healthcare professionals use Doctolib Siilo to discuss and coordinate patient care with colleagues both within and beyond their organisational walls. Today, Doctolib Siilo is the largest medical network in Europe.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Since 2013, Doctolib has been striving for a healthier world by providing new-generation technology. With more than 2,800 employees across France, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands, Doctolib improves the daily lives of healthcare professionals and serves more than 80 million Europeans, offering a fast, frictionless, and secure journey for all their care needs.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Doctolib Siilo is looking for a talented Senior Product Marketing Manager. You will be assigned to Doctolib Siilo products and your mission will be to drive product success \\u0026amp;amp; usage thanks to powerful marketing \\u0026amp;amp; strategic initiatives across Europe.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Reporting to the Head of Product Marketing \\u0026amp;amp; Knowledge, you will work closely with various teams within Doctolib Siilo: Product Management, LGTM, Product Knowledge \\u0026amp;amp; Training, Marketing, Design, UX Writing, Field Teams, Customer Engagement and other PMM teams.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Drive Product Satisfaction through usage boost on existing key features \\u0026amp;amp; launch of new ones\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Take the lead and handle PMO on key projects related to the Product Marketing of our products\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Understand clearly who our users are and how they are using our product, developing sharp customer insights and maximise both usage and satisfaction\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Some of the key topics you will be working on:\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Product \\u0026amp;amp; Features Storytelling \\u0026amp;amp; Positioning\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: product positioning, product messaging, final word on names, taglines, value propositions, storytelling \\u0026amp;amp; marketing content.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;New Features Releases\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: ensure perfect roll-out \\u0026amp;amp; messaging for new features towards Pro users and Doctolibers, including contribution to next Cycle Releases, thanks to a strong pairing with dedicated Feature Teams \\u0026amp;amp; PMs.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Product Usage Engagement\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: increase feature adoption \\u0026amp;amp; usage to boost overall product perceived value of our customers.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Product Feedbacks\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: gather customer feedback \\u0026amp;amp; feature requests to drive our Product Management towards a better product market fit.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Product Onboarding\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: ensure top notch onboarding processes \\u0026amp;amp; campaigns.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;PMO on strategic projects: \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;lead projects with multiple stakeholders from various teams.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Sales Enablement \\u0026amp;amp; Competition watch\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;: provide top-notch content to support sales and strategically adapt our product presentation and roadmap prioritisation thanks to competition insights \\u0026amp;amp; monitoring.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you are:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;If you don\u2019t meet all the requirements below but believe this opportunity matches your expectations and experience, we still encourage you to apply!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You could be our next team mate if you:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have around 7 years of experience\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have previous experiences in PMO with multiple stakeholders, and can bring together multiple functions to get things done in a fast-moving environment\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Ideally, you are experienced in new product launch, product marketing management or go-to-market strategy\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You have strong storytelling \\u0026amp;amp; copywriting skills\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are passionate about both our products and our users\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;You are fluent in English. Dutch, German, Italian or French are a plus\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;The interview process:\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;30\u2019 ITW with the Talent Partner\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;30\u2019 ITW with the Hiring Manager\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Case study (1h with 2 Team Managers)\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Final interview with the Senior Director of Product Operations\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Job details\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Initial term of 12 months\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Full Time\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Workplace: Amsterdam\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Start date: ASAP\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Remuneration: Fix + bonus on objectives (according to your profile)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;A stock options plan for every Doctoliber\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h3\\u0026gt;Our team members are rewarded well, not only from a salary perspective but also with:\\u0026lt;\/h3\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Learning \\u0026amp;amp; development opportunities\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Home office equipment allowance\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Team spirit \\u0026amp;amp; creativity budget\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;27 days of annual leave per year (and the ability to accrue more days on your work anniversary!)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Flexibility days allowing to work in EU countries and the UK 10 days per year\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Employee share plan\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Solidarity Days (2 days per year to help health charities and create a positive social impact)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Wellbeing program (free mental health and coaching offer with our partner moka.care)\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;A flexible workplace policy offering a hybrid work mode\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Reimbursement of public transportation if you live outside the Amsterdam highway ring\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Relocation support for international mobilities\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;At Doctolib, we believe in improving access to healthcare for everyone - regardless of where you come from, what you look like. This translates into our recruitment process: Doctolib is an equal opportunity employer. This new Service will help pave the way for a new direction in the way Care Teams offer Appointments, matching Patients with faster access to Care.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;What you\u2019ll do\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;As a runtime and leveraging modern event driven, distributed technologies;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Thinking user first and helping improve our user experience through new features and design updates, while maintaining high code quality standards;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Taking leadership on delivering roadmap items (together with the team);\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Helping keep our bug backlog small;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Contributing to establishing a technical vision and co-drive the creation of the roadmap for the next quarters;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Bringing your expertise and past experiences to help us continuously improve the way we work.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you are\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;If you that empowers users to manage their health and access to care.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;You will work in a product team that develops essential features and services that enable alerts.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Continuously build your domain knowledge and influence outside the team to help your team deal with dependencies and reduce uncertainty.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Contribute to the modularization of the team\u2019s domain enabling Doctolib to You will collaborate closely with developers to understand their pain points, gather requirements, and drive the development of solutions that empower them to boost their productivity.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Leading the ideation, planning, and execution of initiatives focused on streamlining development processes, reducing friction, and increasing developer satisfaction\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Understanding developers\\u0026#39; pain points \\u0026amp;amp; needs to support operations across several countries and clusters, using qualitative and quantitative data\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Analyzing the competitive landscape, business and technical context through benchmarking and research\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Defining the vision and owning the product strategy of the product brick(s) you are responsible for\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Building a prioritized roadmap and product plan to deliver this vision in a scalable way, taking into account Doctolib\u2019s growth plan\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Being able to explain and convince the different stakeholders about your choice\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Leading the execution of the projects autonomously, from problem definition to solution framing, specs writing, validation of developments, rollout and following-up results and impacts\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Contributing to the global growth of the product team by engaging in knowledge sharing, best-practice implementation, and creating new processes to help us adapt as we scale\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you are\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;If you don\u2019t meet all the requirements below but believe this opportunity matches your expectations and experience, we still encourage you to apply!\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have a proven experience as a \\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Technical Product Manager \\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;or similar role, with a focus on developer experience and tools\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have at least \\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;3 years\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt; process.\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your responsibilities include but are not limited Deine Analyse-, Fehlerbehebungs- und Kommunikationsf\u00e4higkeiten werden sich dadurch bei uns enorm weiterentwickeln.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h1\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Deine Aufgaben\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h1\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Innerhalb eines L3 Support Systems IT Support anzubieten\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Durchf\u00fchren umfassender Analysen von Produkt- und Systeminfrastruktur Problemen unserer L\u00f6sungen beim Kunden\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Bereitstellung von Produkt- und technischem Fachwissen f\u00fcr Kunden und interne Teams\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Probleme und L\u00f6sungen klar und pr\u00e4gnant an verschiedene Zielgruppen kommunizieren\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Enge zusammenarbeit mit anderen Teams im Unternehmen zusammen, um Probleme zu l\u00f6sen und Kundenfeedback weiterzugeben\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h1\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Dein Profil\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h1\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Vorab der kurze Hinweis: Falls Du dem unten beschriebenen Profil nicht exakt entsprichst,\\u0026amp;nbsp; aber trotzdem der Meinung bist, dass die Stellenausschreibung zu Deinen F\u00e4higkeiten passt: Bewirb Dich gerne trotzdem!\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;Um Teil unseres Teams zu werden, bringst du Folgendes mit:\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du hast erweiterte Berufserfahrung in einem SLA gest\u00fctzten IT Support, \\u0026lt;em\\u0026gt;w\u00fcnschenswert mind 2 Jahre\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/em\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du hast exzellente Kommunikations-, Troubleshooting- und analyse F\u00e4higkeiten\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Du beherrscht die Sprachen Deutsch und Englisch mind. You will be at the forefront of maintaining the health and performance of our database.\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;p\\u0026gt;Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:\\u0026lt;\/p\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Build and support strategies to help the modularization of our main PostgreSQL database into a distributed and scalable ecosystem of smaller databases\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Monitor query performance, review data models and data access patterns, while offering insights and recommendations to feature teams for optimization and guidance in selecting appropriate data stores for their use cases\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Perform maintenance related tasks on our managed databases to enhance stability and improve performance\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Develop and evangelize database best practices\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Create documentation and training materials to empower feature teams to make informed decisions regarding data storage and access\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Implement robust monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify performance bottlenecks, latency issues, and potential system failures at the database level\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h4\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Who you bottleneck\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have excellent communication skills, enabling efficient transmission of knowledge.\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Have \u201cParent Care\u201d pour tous les parents, avec un cong\u00e9 maternit\u00e9\/paternit\u00e9 prolong\u00e9 de 4 semaines, une communaut\u00e9 de parents et une journ\u00e9e Kids Day au sein des bureaux\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;De nombreux bureaux offrant des espaces de collaboration et de bien-\u00eatre\\u0026amp;nbsp;\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Une subvention du comit\u00e9 d\\u0026#39;entreprise pour rembourser une partie de l\\u0026#39;adh\u00e9sion \u00e0 un club de sport ou autre activit\u00e9 de loisir\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Une carte Swile et de nombreuses offres de restauration au sein de nos locaux\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Une politique de travail flexible avec un mode hybride et au bureau\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;Le processus de recrutement\\u0026lt;\/strong\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;\/h2\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Un entretien RH de 30 minutes\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Un entretien de 30 minutes avec votre future Manager\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Un entretien de 45 minutes avec votre future Manager et la responsable de l\u2019\u00e9quipe Paid avec restitution \u00e9tude de cas\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;\/ul\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;h2\\u0026gt;\\u0026lt;strong\\u0026gt;D\u00e9tails du Plein\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;Dur\u00e9e : 6 mois\\u0026lt;\/li\\u0026gt;\\n\\u0026lt;li\\u0026gt;D\u00e9but souhait\u00e9 : Septembre
